snippet: Delonte West of the Mavericks created an unusual new category for an N.B.A. foul: thou shalt not stick a finger in an opponent's ear.
abstract: Delonte West of the Mavericks created an unusual new category for an N.B.A. foul: thou shalt not stick a finger in an opponent's ear.

headline.main: Utah's Hayward Gets an Earful of West's Foul
